{"uuid":"694f8c83339b87ece72ccea8e9fa7588cd0dfe03","bioAsHtml":"

With more than 15 years of enterprise Java experience, I am familiar with all the usual technologies in the Java EE software development world. My expertise includes Angular, JSF, JAX-RS, JPA, Hibernate, EJB 3.x and several Spring frameworks. Since the advent of functional languages on the JVM, I have started working on Big and Fast Data technologies using with Python, Java and Scala. Outside work I am actively contributing to the Java Meetup in Groningen (NL), where we've hosted evening sessions about Angular, Ionic, Kotlin, with more to come.
